ComicInfo.Summary:
Sara and Maxx retreat under an overpass and reflect on their own personal demons. The black Isz keep spilling into the real world as omens of Mr. Gone's plans grow more evident. Meanwhile, Julie tries to help Sara sort out high school nightmares and encounters with bullies that send Sara to the breaking point. Digitally re-mastered and re-colored!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Sam Kieth | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Sam Kieth (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 17:56:03. [CVDB445204]
ComicInfo.Characters: Isz, Julie Winters, Maxx, Mr. Gone, Sarah James
